name: Vicious Fangs
summary: You aim for your victim's prominent arteries.
description:
You aim for your victim's prominent arteries. Your fangs Strike deals an additional 1d6 persistent bleed damage on a critical hit. At 14th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to 2d6, and at 20th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to 3d6.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
